title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the correct demonstration of variable limit using k as upper or lower limit with 4 or 9 (or imported limit)

∫ 4 k dx x  or  ∫ k 9 dx x MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGcbaWaa8qmaeaada WcaaqaaiaadsgacaWG4baabaWaaOaaaeaacaWG4baaleqaaaaakiaa bccacaqGVbGaaeOCaiaabccaaSqaaiaaisdaaeaacaWGRbaaniabgU IiYdGcdaWdXaqaamaalaaabaGaamizaiaadIhaaeaadaGcaaqaaiaa dIhaaSqabaaaaaqaaiaadUgaaeaacaaI5aaaniabgUIiYdaaaa@46FB@

1 point is earned for the correct equation involving the two halves of R that when solved will give answer with demonstrated algorithm that knows when to stop

1 point is earned for the correct answer

0/1 if answer from equation not involving relevant areas

1/3 bald answer

∫ 4 k dx x =1 2 x ] 4 k =1 2 k −2 4 =1 k= 25 4 ( or  ∫ k 9 dx x =1  or  ∫ 4 k dx x = ∫ k 9 dx x ) MathType@MTEF@5@5@+= feaagKart1ev2aaatCvAUfeBSjuyZL2yd9gzLbvyNv2CaerbuLwBLn hiov2DGi1BTfMBaeXatLxBI9gBaerbd9wDYLwzYbItLDharqqtubsr 4rNCHbGeaGqiVu0Je9sqqrpepC0xbbL8F4rqqrFfpeea0xe9Lq=Jc9 vqaqpepm0xbba9pwe9Q8fs0=yqaqpepae9pg0FirpepeKkFr0xfr=x fr=xb9adbaqaaeGaciGaaiaabeqaamaabaabaaGceaqabeaadaWdXa qaamaalaaabaGaamizaiaadIhaaeaadaGcaaqaaiaadIhaaSqabaaa aOGaeyypa0JaaGymaaWcbaGaaGinaaqaaiaadUgaa0Gaey4kIipaaO qaaiaaikdadaWacaqaamaakaaabaGaamiEaaWcbeaaaOGaayzxaaWa a0baaSqaaiaaisdaaeaacaWGRbaaaOGaeyypa0JaaGymaaqaaiaaik dadaGcaaqaaiaadUgaaSqabaGccqGHsislcaaIYaWaaOaaaeaacaaI 0aaaleqaaOGaeyypa0JaaGymaaqaaiaadUgacqGH9aqpdaWcaaqaai aaikdacaaI1aaabaGaaGinaaaaaeaadaqadaqaaiaab+gacaqGYbGa aeiiamaapedabaWaaSaaaeaacaWGKbGaamiEaaqaamaakaaabaGaam iEaaWcbeaaaaGccqGH9aqpcaaIXaaaleaacaWGRbaabaGaaGyoaaqd cqGHRiI8aOGaaeiiaiaab+gacaqGYbGaaeiiamaapedabaWaaSaaae aacaWGKbGaamiEaaqaamaakaaabaGaamiEaaWcbeaaaaGccqGH9aqp daWdXaqaamaalaaabaGaamizaiaadIhaaeaadaGcaaqaaiaadIhaaS qabaaaaaqaaiaadUgaaeaacaaI5aaaniabgUIiYdaaleaacaaI0aaa baGaam4AaaqdcqGHRiI8aaGccaGLOaGaayzkaaaaaaa@6E76@

1 point is earned for the correct demonstration of variable limit using k as upper or lower limit with 4 or 9 (or imported limit)
